<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\file</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Optimize LiveIntervals for use in a post-RA context.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="comment">/// LiveIntervals normally runs before register allocation when the code is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="comment">/// only recently lowered out of SSA form, so it&#39;s uncommon for registers to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="comment">/// have multiple defs, and when they do, the defs are usually closely related.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Later, after coalescing, tail duplication, and other optimizations, it&#39;s</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="comment">/// more common to see registers with multiple unrelated defs. This pass</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="comment">/// updates LiveIntervals to distribute the value numbers across separate</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="comment">/// LiveIntervals.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In FixIrreducibleControlFlow, we conservatively inserted IMPLICIT&#95;DEF</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions to satisfy LiveIntervals&#39; requirement that all uses be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
